list_definition.definition: the actual doing of something, as opposed to the theory or idea

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: In theory the plan should work, but in practice there are a lot of difficulties.

list_definition.definition: the usual way(s) of doing things; (a) habit or custom

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: It was his usual practice to rise at 6.00 a.m.

list_definition.definition: the repeated performance or exercise of something in order to learn to do it well

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She has musical talent, but she needs a lot of practice
Have a quick practice before you start.
He has a practice in Southampton.
